message: I propose dividing the money in a 3:1 ratio. I believe this is fair considering the risk of inflation.
I think 60:40 is a more balanced ratio, considering the inflation impact on our decisions
Considering the inflation, I propose an equal division of the funds. This maintains fairness and ensures both of us receive a comparable share.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I should get a slightly larger share to account for my previous rejections
